properties.name: Apartment Option 1
properties.description: Posted by Revblk : 911 SE 60th, Portland ORThis one is honestly a little far out, but not TOO far. It\'s location on Belmont should mean access to the #15 Bus line, and the 15 should be able to get you most places you need to go.

properties.name: Apartment Option 2
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 2727 Se 60TH Ave, portland, orI like this one a little better than option 1 not only because it\'s a whole house, but because it\'s south of Division rather than Belmont, and that means access to the #4, which I feel is a better line with more direct access to many of the places you would want to go.

properties.name: Apartment Option 3
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 1717 SW Park Ave, 97201Downtown! Near the university if their ad is to be believed. Not sure where exactly this is, but it\'s probably just near enough to stuff to be tempting, and just far enough away to to be irritating. I would need to go see this one to decide. Plenty of hobos and panhandlers downtown to keep things interesting! If you intend to work for one of the resort hotels downtown, this might be an excellent choice.

properties.name: Apartment Option 4
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 6142 SW Bonita Lake Oswego ORAs you can plainly see, this is the best option for you if you would like to live way the hell out in Lake Oswego and, i dunno ... go to church a lot?

properties.name: Apartment Option 5
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 104 NW 20th Avenue, Portland OrThis place sounds like it would be cool to live in! And then you realize that if part of its charm is a bed from 1910 that has to be pulled off the wall, maybe it\'s a little small? It\'s not in a terrible location, and the ad does make a point of noting that it\'s a "Secure building," so your chances of anything untoward happening are certainly less than in Oldtown/Chinatown.

properties.name: Apartment Option 6
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 1401 SE Morrison St, Portland, ORWell, the CL ad for this has already been flagged for removal, but if this is actually here, it sounds pretty good!

properties.name: Blue Moon Camera & Machine
properties.description: Posted by Revblk  8417 N Lombard St, Portland, ORI believe you intended to get a dinkey and go on a barefoot pilgrimage here. And for good reason!

properties.name: Common Grounds
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 2927 NE Everett Street PortlandThe single best place to schvitz in this town! You really should be working here!

properties.name: Nicolas' Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 318 SE Grand Ave Portland, OR 97214This is the Lebanese place with the superb hummus and pita.

properties.name: Powell's City of Books
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 1005 W. Burnside, Portland, ORThe legendary city of books. Please feel free to worship at your leisure.

properties.name: Tel Orleans
properties.description: Posted by Revblk 1969 SE 25th Ave, Portland, OR 97214You may want to hang out here a lot. It is where you will find me most of the time.
